top_stories.title: OpenAI wants to power your browser, and that might be a security nightmare
top_stories.description: The browser wars are heating up again, this time with AI in the driver’s seat. OpenAI just launched Atlas, a ChatGPT-powered browser that lets users surf the web using natural language and even includes an “agent mode” that can complete tasks autonomously. It’s one of the biggest browser launches in recent memory, but it’s debuting […]
top_stories.author: Theresa Loconsolo, Maxwell Zeff, Anthony Ha, Sean O'Kane
top_stories.content: The browser wars are heating up again, this time with AI in the driver’s seat. top_stories.title: Fractal Earns AWS Generative AI Consulting Services Competency
top_stories.description: Fractal (www.fractal.ai), a global provider of artificial intelligence solutions to Fortune 500® companies, announced today that it has achieved the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Generative AI Consulting Services Competency. This milestone recognizes Fractal’s expertise and commitment to leveraging AI technologies to drive innovation and transformation for its global clients. The AWS... The post Fractal Earns AWS Generative AI Consulting Services Competency first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Amazon launches $68 million AI PhD Fellowship program
top_stories.description: Initiative will fund over 100 doctoral students researching machine learning, computer vision, and natural-language processing at nine universities.
top_stories.author: Staff writer
top_stories.content: Initiative will fund over 100 doctoral students researching machine learning, computer vision, and natural-language processing at nine universities.

top_stories.title: Transforming enterprise operations: Four high-impact use cases with Amazon Nova
top_stories.description: In this post, we share four high-impact, widely adopted use cases built with Nova in Amazon Bedrock, supported by real-world customers deployments, offerings available from AWS partners, and experiences. These examples are ideal for organizations researching their own AI adoption strategies and use cases across industries.
top_stories.author: Abhinav Bhargava
top_stories.content: In this post, we share four high-impact, widely adopted use cases built with Nova in Amazon Bedrock, supported by real-world customers deployments, offerings available from AWS partners, and experiences. These examples are ideal for organizations researching their own AI adoption strategies and use cases across industries.

top_stories.title: Can AI Make Recruitment More Human? LinkedIn Thinks So
top_stories.description: At Cypher 2025, Karthik Ramgopal, tech lead of product engineering at LinkedIn, said the company’s AI-powered Hiring Assistant was meant to bring purpose back to work, not to replace recruiters. The post Can AI Make Recruitment More Human? LinkedIn Thinks So appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: Shalini Mondal
top_stories.content: At Cypher 2025, Karthik Ramgopal, tech lead of product engineering at LinkedIn, said the company’s AI-powered Hiring Assistant was meant to bring purpose back to work, not to replace recruiters. The post Can AI Make Recruitment More Human? LinkedIn Thinks So appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
